Slide_Applications: Title Slide,Section Divider,Title and Content,Two Content
Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Use high-contrast versions for projection. Primary: #000000, Secondary: #FFFFFF, CTA: #0066CC for visibility
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In, Slide In; Emphasis: Pulse; Transition: Fade
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 7:1 minimum for projector. Avoid dark-on-dark
Best_For_Presentation: Board presentations, Executive summaries, Formal reports
Accessibility_Notes: Excellent for projection. High contrast ensures visibility. WCAG AAA compliant.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Increase contrast by 30% for projection. Avoid subtle shadows. Use solid borders.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In; Emphasis: Color Font; Transition: Fade
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 5:1 minimum. Test with actual projector.
Accessibility_Notes: Low contrast risk on projectors. Use solid backgrounds (#F5F5F5) and clear borders.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Increase background opacity. Use #FFFFFF or #F5F5F5 for projector-friendly glass.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In, Slide In; Emphasis: Pulse; Transition: Fade
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 5:1 minimum. Use solid background behind text.
Best_For_Presentation: Modern SaaS, Product launches, Portfolio showcases
Accessibility_Notes: Good for projection. Use solid background color with subtle blur effect.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Works well on projector. High contrast inherent. Avoid neon backgrounds.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Appear, Fade In; Emphasis: Color Font; Transition: Wipe
Best_For_Presentation: Creative presentations, Design showcases, Tech blogs
Accessibility_Notes: Excellent visibility. Bold elements translate well to projection.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Reduce 3D effects for projection. Use flat representations of depth cues.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Slide In; Emphasis: Zoom; Transition: Push
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 5:1 minimum. Test shadows on actual projector.
Accessibility_Notes: 3D effects may not translate. Use clear depth cues and bold colors.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Works excellently. Bold colors project well. Ensure text has contrast background.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Slide In, Fade In; Emphasis: Grow with Color; Transition: Push
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 5:1 minimum. Use solid color blocks behind text.
Best_For_Presentation: Startup pitches, Creative showcases, Product launches
Accessibility_Notes: Excellent for projection. Bold blocks create visual interest and clarity.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Use dark grey (#1A1A2E) instead of pure black. Avoid high brightness differences.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In; Emphasis: Pulse; Transition: Fade
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 6:1 minimum. Test on actual projector.
Accessibility_Notes: Good for dim rooms. Avoid pure black backgrounds which can cause issues.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Already optimized for visibility. Good choice for all presentation contexts.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In; Emphasis: Appear; Transition: Fade
Accessibility_Notes: Best choice for maximum visibility and accessibility.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Increase contrast. Use solid backgrounds. Reduce shadow depth for projection.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In; Emphasis: Soft Pulse; Transition: Fade
Accessibility_Notes: Playful style may not suit all contexts. Test on actual projector.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Reduce animation complexity. Use static gradient or simplified version.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In; Emphasis: Color Font; Transition: Fade
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 5:1 minimum. Avoid subtle gradient text.
Best_For_Presentation: Creative showcases, Brand presentations, Landing pages
Accessibility_Notes: Gradient effects may be lost. Use bold gradient colors.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Works well in dim rooms. Neon colors project well. Avoid subtle CRT effects.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Slide In; Emphasis: Color Font; Transition: Push
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 6:1 minimum. Test neon colors.
Accessibility_Notes: Nostalgic elements may not suit all audiences. Test CRT effects.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Already projector-friendly. Simple and effective for all contexts.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In, Appear; Emphasis: Color Font; Transition: Fade
Accessibility_Notes: Best choice for reliability. Minimal style works everywhere.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Use simplified textures. High-contrast version for projection.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Slide In; Emphasis: Zoom; Transition: Push
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 5:1 minimum. Avoid subtle textures.
Accessibility_Notes: Textures may not display well. Use bold, clear skeuomorphic elements.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Reduce animation. Use solid or simplified gradient for projector.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In; Emphasis: Soft Pulse; Transition: Fade
Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 5:1 minimum. Avoid complex liquid effects.
Accessibility_Notes: Liquid effects may be lost. Use bold colors and clear forms.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Use fewer, bolder animations. Ensure animations convey information, not just decorate.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Slide In, Fade In; Emphasis: Grow; Transition: Push
Accessibility_Notes: Animation should enhance, not distract. Keep animations purposeful.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Use larger, bolder interactions. Ensure visible feedback at distance.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In; Emphasis: Pulse; Transition: Fade
Accessibility_Notes: Interactions must be visible. Use larger touch targets and bolder feedback.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Already optimized for visibility and accessibility.
Animation_Recommendations: Entrance: Fade In; Emphasis: Appear; Transition: Fade
Accessibility_Notes: Best for accessibility. Works well for all audiences.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Avoid relying on voice/focus states. Use explicit visible indicators.

Accessibility_Notes: Zero UI requires context. Use visible cues and text labels.

Contrast_Requirements: Contrast Ratio: 5:1 minimum. Use overlay on images.
Accessibility_Notes: Excellent for impact. Ensure text readability on all backgrounds.

Color_Scheme_Adaptation: Adaptation: Works well. Ensure CTA buttons have high contrast.

Accessibility_Notes: Clear CTAs work well. Ensure button contrast.
